biotools.summary: CPE-SLDI is a model for predicting coding potential. It uses oversampling technology and increase the number of positive instances and alleviate the problem of local data imbalance, and propose a coding potential prediction method, CPE-SLDI, which constructs a prediction model by combining various sequence-derived features based on the augmented data.
